body_html:
@bnurbekov https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.h#L70

Eigen::Tensor has a larger alignment (maybe 512), but it doesn't matter as long as TF allocator is happy with the alignment of your buffer.

Eigen::Tensor has a larger alignment (maybe 512), but it doesn't matter as long as TF allocator is happy with the alignment of your buffer.
body:
@bnurbekov https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.h#L70

Eigen::Tensor has a larger alignment (maybe 512), but it doesn't matter as long as TF allocator is happy with the alignment of your buffer.
